short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view all the images on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is useful for anyone who needs a quick way to get all the images on a page. View them alongside the page, copy, paste, and get URLs for the images, so you can use them elsewhere. You can also use this to find any broken images, and their URLs.
